forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 57F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then clearing overnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly clear after midnight. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. SE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 50F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 5C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High around 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 36F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny in the morning. Increasing clouds with showers later in the day. High around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
